div.head: 生子不下
div.div: failure of a child to descend

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: failure of a child to descend

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with nan chan 難產 , difficult delivery. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry zha chan 蚱 蟬：小兒驚癇，婦人生子不下 , “[It cures] children with fright epilepsy, and women with a failure of a child [that is to be born] to descend ”.
